name: wheretopublish
description: Interactive Where to Publish? website dependencies

scripts.build:minified: mkdir -p vendor/images && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net/js/jquery.dataTables.min.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-responsive/js/dataTables.responsive.min.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-buttons/js/dataTables.buttons.min.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-buttons/js/buttons.html5.min.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-buttons/js/buttons.colVis.min.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-fixedheader/js/dataTables.fixedHeader.min.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-searchpanes/js/dataTables.searchPanes.min.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-staterestore/js/dataTables.stateRestore.min.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-dt/css/jquery.dataTables.min.css vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-dt/images/*.png vendor/images/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-responsive-dt/css/responsive.dataTables.min.css vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-buttons-dt/css/buttons.dataTables.min.css vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-fixedheader-dt/css/fixedHeader.dataTables.min.css vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-searchpanes-dt/css/searchPanes.dataTables.min.css vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-staterestore-dt/css/stateRestore.dataTables.min.css vendor/ && cp node_modules/hint.css/hint.min.css vendor/
scripts.build:dev: mkdir -p vendor/images && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net/js/jquery.dataTables.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-responsive/js/dataTables.responsive.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-buttons/js/dataTables.buttons.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-buttons/js/buttons.html5.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-buttons/js/buttons.colVis.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-fixedheader/js/dataTables.fixedHeader.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-searchpanes/js/dataTables.searchPanes.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-staterestore/js/dataTables.stateRestore.js vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-dt/css/jquery.dataTables.css vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-dt/images/*.png vendor/images/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-responsive-dt/css/responsive.dataTables.css vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-buttons-dt/css/buttons.dataTables.css vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-fixedheader-dt/css/fixedHeader.dataTables.css vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-searchpanes-dt/css/searchPanes.dataTables.css vendor/ && cp node_modules/datatables.net-staterestore-dt/css/stateRestore.dataTables.css vendor/ && cp node_modules/hint.css/hint.css vendor/
scripts.clean: rm -rf vendor/ && rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -f package-lock.json
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build
scripts.rebuild:dev: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build:dev && npm run build:minified
